quote.author: Princess Diana
quote.quoteName: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.

quote.author: Misha Collins
quote.quoteName: I actually think that the most efficacious way of making a difference is to lead by example, and doing random acts of kindness is setting a very good example of how to behave in the world.
